posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Sweet Cap Joe Tinker portrait SGC 3.5...
posts.post_content:
For sale here, a SGC 3.5 VG+ Sweet Caporal T206 Joe Tinker portrait.  Nice card of the Chicago Cubs HOFer.

Price: $SOLD, net to me, postpaid in the continental U.S. Tax free.  :eek:

Please message me if interested. Thank you.
